Authors:
Praveen Gehlot, Dilip S Solanki, Surendra Kumar, Khushbu
Parihar, Alkesh Tak, Rakesh Pathak, Sunil K Singh
Title:
Hitherto known gastroid fungus Broomeia congregata: A new
record from India inferred with ribosomal DNA sequences and
Phylogeny
Keywords: ITS-5.8S rRNA gene, Indian Thar Desert
Abstract:
A novel Gastromycetous fungus was found growing during
monsoon rains under Prosopis juliflora tree in Jodhpur and is being
reported as a new record from Great Indian Thar Desert, India.
Morphological examination of specimens, scanning electron microscopy of
spores and ITS-5.8S rRNA gene sequences identified the specimens as
Broomeia congregata Berk.
